content.new_chat_hero: I-AI Chatbot eyenzelwe ukusiza izinhlangano ezizimele ezinabantu abaphokophelele
content.please_wait: Sicela ulinde ukuthi imodeli iqede ukuphendula!
content.sidebar_explainer: Imiyalezo yakho izovela lapha uma usuqalile ukuxoxa!
content.login_to_save_chats: Ngena ukuze ulondoloze futhi uphinde ubone imiyalezo yangaphambilini!
content.conversation_will_appear: Imiyalezo yakho izovela lapha uma usuqalile ukuxoxa!
content.cannot_undo: Lesi senzo ngeke sibuyele emuva. Lokhu kuzokususa umlayezo wakho unomphela futhi ususe kuzingodo zethu.

strategic_campaign.title: Ngisize ukudizayina isu lezinyanga ezi-3 zokuxhasa [umgomo noma umbangela]
strategic_campaign.label: Yiziphi izimpawu ezibalulekile, izethameli ezihlosiwe, namapulatifomu ahambisana nalolu daba?
